page.title: 09SPORT IN BIGGLESWADE
page.content: The town fields a wide range of teams in various sports, who compete at local league & inter county levels. Cricket, football, netball & rugby are all played competitively, & there is a{ladies football team}which has had great success. Facilities for sport are good, especially with the opening in recent years of the{indoor {sports centre.}There are clubs for the enjoyment of all the following sports: Angling, athletics & road running, sub aqua, badminton, bowls, cycling, judo, hockey, karate, swimming(including the handicapped), squash, table tennis, tennis & water skiing. Darts & bowling are popular in local pubs. Many ponies & horses are kept on the outskirts of town, & shooting & fishing are other hobbies enjoyed by many.
